message: Another great write-up. In my webinars around NServiceBus v6 wich is async from top to bottom I explained another cause why you should always first go with the keywords and then optimize if necessary. The case is when you upgrade existing message handlers you will not forget the await statements when you first mark the handler method async. The compiler guides you then through the process. After you've done that you can look at the code and decide whether it is worth optimizing or not.
